title: If League focused more on map variety and less on map balance, would it be more fun?
body:
I'm just curious. Perhaps if League had, say, 10 maps with their own gimmick, then it could increase the fun factor? Not every champion would have to be good on every map. SR would remain the primary map, but it would be a nice distraction/addition I think.

I wanna hear other people's thoughts on this.
